text:
gRuhNAti dhruqvO#&si dhruqvO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsaqmiti# pariqdhIn pari# dadhAtyAqSiSha#mEqvaitAmA SAqstE&thO# EqtadEqva sarva(gm)# sajAqtEShvadhi# Bavatiq yasyaiqvaM ~MviqduSha# EqtE pa#riqdhaya#H paridhIqyantaq Ama# namaqsyAma#nasya dEvAq iti# tiqsra Ahu#tI rjuhOtyEqtAva#ntOq vai sa#jAqtA yE maqhAntOq yE kShu#llaqkA yAH striyaqstAnEqvAva# rundhEq ( ) ta E#naqmava#ruddhAq upa# tiShThantE || 37
(svAhA &&ma#namasi - sajAqtAnA(gm)# - rundhEq - pa~jca# ca ) (A9)
